title: G-Spot 2 Lust: The 5th Deadly Sin
description: In Part 5 of G-Spot 2: The Seven Deadly Sins...Juicy-Mo’s on fire and she’s feeling herself!It’s been a hard-knock life for Juicy-Mo Stanfield, and drama seems to find her no matter where she tries to hide. Even though she’s been sprung from jail the G-Spot Crew is still on her trail, Flex has turned into a murderous psycho, and Juicy is hurt and all alone on the treacherous streets of New York City. Is Harlem's #1 Stunna down for the count? Now that she's weak and vulnerable, will her enemies finally catch up with her and go for their revenge? Is the magic of love and happiness a thing of the past for Juicy? Or does life hold one more trump card for the beautiful hood chick from 136th Street? Find Out More InG-SPOT 2: THE SEVEN DEADLY THE 5th DEADLY SIN
author: Noire
